column1: Little Goat Diner////Awesome vegan menu. It's not a ton of options
column2: but everything is tasty. The avocado toast is always good. The ingredients change seasonally. We always get it. The pasta and scallion pancakes change with the season
column3: too. The vegan home fries are AMAZING. They are probably the best part. Also
column4: the vegan chocolate shake is quite good.
